channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Elementor Addon Elements
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Elementor Addon Elements

item.title: CVE-2021-24259|2024-08-03T19:28:22.703Z -- unknown -- elementor%20addon%20elements
item.description: The “Elementor Addon Elements” WordPress Plugin before 1.11.2 has several widgets that are vulnerable to stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) by lower-privileged users such as contributors, all via a similar method.
